Class InventoryView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • InventoryView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EvolutionView

    public class InventoryView
extends View
    View class representing the inventory display, allowing users to manage and view their creatures. Extends the base View class and provides methods to update and interact with the inventory UI.
